text: Microsoft Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, released on April 25, 2005, is an edition of Windows XP for x86-64 personal computers. It was designed to use the expanded 64-bit memory provided by the x86-64 architecture. Windows XP Professional x64 Edition is not to be confused with Windows XP 64-Bit Edition, which was published in Windows XP Professional x64 Edition and included with Windows XP 64-Bit Edition for 64-Bit Extended System. == Related pages == * Windows XP * Windows XP 64-Bit Edition Category:Microsoft Windows software
title: Windows XP Professional x64 Edition
